    public class Farmer
extends game.Human
    Create a farmer actor Return an action that can be done by the farmer among the list created
    Author:
    Song Xen Hwa

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Farmer have a probability of 0.33 to sow a crop. Eating and harvesting can only be done when actor is directly above the item.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class game.Human
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Farmer is
        display - the Display where the Farmer's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        an action done by the farmer actor
